Package ch.codebulb.crudlet.model.errors

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IllegalRequestExceptions
    Contains all exception classes representing REST contract violations.
    RestErrorBuilder
    A wrapper for exceptions which transforms them to a REST error response including a response body with a user-friendly, I18N-ready error message.
    RestValidationConstraintErrorBuilder
    A wrapper to transform a ConstraintViolationException into a REST error response including a response body with a user-friendly, I18N-ready error message.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    IllegalRequestExceptions.BodyIdDoesNotMatchPathException  
    IllegalRequestExceptions.BodyIdIsNotNullException
